senses.sense_definition: Having many folds, layers, or plates.

examples.text: The artist created a complex sculpture using <w>manifolded</w> layers of thick paper.
He carefully unfolded the <w>manifolded</w> letter to read the hidden text inside.

senses.sense_definition: Arranged in or connected to a manifold (a pipe or chamber with multiple openings).

examples.text: The engineers designed a <w>manifolded</w> exhaust system to improve the engine's efficiency.
A <w>manifolded</w> cylinder setup ensures that pressure is distributed evenly across the device.
